## Linear Regression
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Load data
library(AER)
data("CigarettesSW")
```

```{r}
# Check out variables
glimpse(CigarettesSW)

# Regress price onto packs per capita 
packs_price <- lm(packs ~ price, data = CigarettesSW)
summary(packs_price)

# Graph
ggplot(data = CigarettesSW, mapping = aes(packs, price)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)


```
